creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: a line of silhouetted figures with umbrellas--one group with a small dog--walk through the rain along a river; line of silhouetted buildings on L with red paper lanterns; green foliage at R; orange umbrella in foreground at front
marks:

title: Kamogawa
